BBK01.SU0112: Discount rate of the Bundesbank / End of month

General: Until 31 July 1990 this was also the rate for cash advances. Until May 1956 lower rates likewise applied for foreign bills and export drafts; fixed special rates were charged for certain credits which had been granted to the Reconstruction Loan Corporation and which ran out at the end of 1958.
Comment on 1996-04: From 19 April 1996 to 31 December 1998 2.50%
